definitions.definition: To renounce upon oath; to forswear; to disavow.
definitions.example: To abjure allegiance to a prince.

definitions.definition: To cause one to renounce or recant.
To reject with solemnity; to abandon forever; to repudiate; to disclaim.
To abstain from; to avoid; to shun.
Having been renounced, forsworn or rejected.
